entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to rain in the morning. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
